name: Overgrown Meadows
description:
Press Space to toggle plants. Click on a plant to uproot it, and click the ground to plant one. Try to challenge your self to get a highscore within a certain amount of time (three minutes maybe) if you desire, otherwise just enjoy this relaxing game and try to make a beautiful sanctuary!

This game takes longer in the beginning, so setup wisely if you are going towards a goal. Let me know which ones you completed!

Example goals:

A: 1000 in 2 minutes

B: 256 in 1 minute

C: 10000 in 5 minutes
